points: To offer Diploma programme in electrical & electronics engineering through effective outcome based teaching-learning process in compliance with industry needs.
To provide a conducive environment for innovative research and sustainable development of society and industry.
To inculcate the sense of excitement in students towards higher education and entrepreneurship.
To create awareness for moral and ethical values among faculty and students.

To impart quality education that develops the capabilities for problem solving, effective communication and ethical sensitivity, thus bringing out competent Electrical & Electronics Engineers with leadership role in industry, business and society.
